alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 9:52PM CDT until May 08 at 8:54PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Austin/San Antonio TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge affecting Goliad and Karnes Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Flooding spreads across the wide flood plain upstream and downstream. No structures are threatened. Livestock and farm equipment will need to removed from the floodplain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 23.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 29.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 23.6 Sun 9 pm CDT 19.4 12.0 11.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
